channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-17010] Serial replication should handle daughter regions being assigned to another RS
item.description:
testRegionSplit and testRegionMerge were temporarily disabled by HBASE-16975.

HBASE-9465 has an assumption that when we split a region, two daughter regions are in same RS with the parent region. But after HBASE-14551 went in, daughter regions may be assigned to other RS directly.

This issue is to handle the new behavior and reenable the tests.
item.summary: Serial replication should handle daughter regions being assigned to another RS

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Upload a patch for master. In this patch, I add a new cf in meta to prevent using a special cq in rep_position, so we need also apply the change to branch-1.

-1 overall

This message was automatically generated.

+  public static Put makeSerialParentPut(byte[] encodedRegionName, byte[] value) {

'Serial' in the method name is not needed. Same with makeSerialDaughterPut.


+   * Get parent region(s) for a region, only used in serial replication.

+   * @throws IOException

Add javadoc for @param and @return


+  /** The replication meta family as a string*/

+  public static final String REPLICATION_META_FAMILY_STR = "rep_meta";

Looks like we should create ReplicationConstants.java (doesn't have to be done in this JIRA)


+      while (true) {

+        boolean allParentDone = true;

There is no limit for the duration of the loop ?

There is no limit for the duration of the loop ?

We should wait forever until parent region's log has been pushed, or the order will be broken.
Fix according to reviews

For the loop in ReplicationSourceManager, is it possible to display some warning on UI after certain period has passed ?

What do you think ?
Sounds good. I think we can add a warning on UI if there are any replication source being blocking too long time or too many logs? Not only for serial replication.

V3 patch looks good to me
Skimmed the v3 patch. LGTM. +1.

Phil:
branch-1 patch is much smaller than master patch.
Just want to confirm.
Yes, in branch-1 we still use old logic on split, so we don't check if we have pushed all logs in parent regions. The only change is leave two columns into new cf

Thanks for the patch, Phil.

Thanks for the reviews.

Thanks Ted.
Thanks all for reviewing.
